author: quinton-ashley
description: Get a list of the apps the user has open.
name: get-open-apps

scripts.first: git add -A && git commit -m $npm_package_version && A='{"name":"'$npm_package_name'","description":"'$npm_package_description'","license_template":"'$npm_package_license'"}' && echo "${A}" && curl -u $npm_package_author_name https://api.github.com/user/repos -d "${A}" && git remote add origin 'https://github.com/'$npm_package_author_name'/'$npm_package_name'.git' && git push --set-upstream origin master && git push && git push --tags
scripts.postversion: git remote | xargs -L1 git push --all && git push --tags && npm publish
